item.title: Hugo
item.description: Tutorials https://www.davd.io/blog-with-hugo-1-getting-started/ https://www.jakewiesler.com/blog/hugo-directory-structure/ https://www.sarasoueidan.com/blog/jekyll-ghpages-to-hugo-netlify/ Server To run server: $ hugo server Use the -D flag if you want to compile draft files too. Other things Taxonomies are like tag mechanisms. I don't need to use them (yet). _index.org in the main content/ directory is used to render the homepage. In general, an _index.
